import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';import*as d3 from'd3';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProteinNetwork(_ref){let{onSelectProtein}=_ref;const svgRef=useRef(null);const[data,setData]=useState({nodes:[],links:[]});const[svgDimensions,setSvgDimensions]=useState({width:800,height:600});// 转换互作数据为网络图数据
const transformData=interactions=>{const nodesMap=new Map();const links=[];// 处理互作数据
interactions.forEach(interaction=>{const source=interaction['Protein 1'];const target=interaction['Protein 2'];const score=parseFloat(interaction.Score);// 添加节点
if(!nodesMap.has(source)){nodesMap.set(source,{id:source});}if(!nodesMap.has(target)){nodesMap.set(target,{id:target});}// 添加链接
links.push({source,target,value:score});});return{nodes:Array.from(nodesMap.values()),links};};// 加载互作数据
useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/interactions');const interactions=await response.json();const graphData=transformData(interactions);setData(graphData);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to fetch interactions:',error);}};fetchData();},[]);useEffect(()=>{const svg=d3.select(svgRef.current);// 设置SVG尺寸
svg.attr('width',svgDimensions.width).attr('height',svgDimensions.height).style('transition','all 0.3s ease');// 创建力导向图模拟
const simulation=d3.forceSimulation(data.nodes).force('link',d3.forceLink(data.links).id(d=>d.id).distance(100)).force('charge',d3.forceManyBody().strength(-200)).force('center',d3.forceCenter(svgDimensions.width/2,svgDimensions.height/2)).force('collision',d3.forceCollide().radius(30));// 创建链接
const link=svg.append('g').selectAll('line').data(data.links).join('line').attr('stroke',d=>d.value===1?'#1976d2':'#999').attr('stroke-opacity',d=>d.value===1?1:0.6).attr('stroke-width',d=>d.value===1?2:Math.sqrt(d.value||1)).attr('stroke-dasharray',d=>d.value===1?null:'2,2');// 创建节点
const node=svg.append('g').attr('stroke','#fff').attr('stroke-width',1.5).selectAll('circle').data(data.nodes).join('circle').attr('r',8).attr('fill','#1976d2').call(d3.drag().on('start',dragstarted).on('drag',dragged).on('end',dragended)).on('click',(event,d)=>{onSelectProtein(d.id);}).on('mouseover',function(){d3.select(this).transition().duration(100).attr('r',12).attr('fill','#ff7f0e');}).on('mouseout',function(){d3.select(this).transition().duration(100).attr('r',8).attr('fill','#1976d2');});// 添加节点标签
const label=svg.append('g').selectAll('text').data(data.nodes).join('text').text(d=>d.id).attr('font-size',10).attr('dx',12).attr('dy','.35em');// 动画更新
simulation.on('tick',()=>{link.attr('x1',d=>d.source.x).attr('y1',d=>d.source.y).attr('x2',d=>d.target.x).attr('y2',d=>d.target.y);node.attr('cx',d=>d.x).attr('cy',d=>d.y);label.attr('x',d=>d.x).attr('y',d=>d.y);});// 拖拽事件处理
function dragstarted(event,d){if(!event.active)simulation.alphaTarget(0.3).restart();d.fx=d.x;d.fy=d.y;}function dragged(event,d){d.fx=event.x;d.fy=event.y;}function dragended(event,d){if(!event.active)simulation.alphaTarget(0);d.fx=null;d.fy=null;}},[data,width,height]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{ref:svgRef,style:{width:svgDimensions.width,height:svgDimensions.height,backgroundColor:'#f0f0f0',borderRadius:'8px'}});}export default ProteinNetwork;
